title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-c - Designation of psychiatric examiners
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-c - Designation of psychiatric examiners

State Regulations
C.P.L. Article 730
FORM 16-c
12/88
DESIGNATION OF PSYCHIATRIC EXAMINERS
________ COURT OF ________
COUNTY OF ________
________x
PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, DESIGNATION
OF
PSYCHIATRIC
- against - EXAMINERS
Docket No. ________
________ Indictment No. ________
Defendant. ________x

The undersigned, having been directed by order
signed by Honorable ________, (Judge) (Justice) of the ________ Court of
________ County, dated ________, to examine the above named defendant pursuant
to Article 730 of the Criminal Procedure Law, does hereby designate ________, a
qualified psychiatrist and ________ (a qualified psychiatrist) (a qualified
psychologist) for the purpose of conducting the examination of said defendant, each to make a separate report of said examination. Dated: ________
______________
Signature
______________
Printed Name

Director of Community Mental

Health Services, ____________ County

Director ____________
Hospital

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form
16-c

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
